## Import Dataset Awal
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
rawdt <- read_csv("D:\\DA_PORTO\\R\\Study Case\\FMCG_2022_2024.csv")
glimpse(rawdt)
```

## Kolom Data yang digunakan
```{r}
#Daily records
dtts <- rawdt %>%
  mutate(total_revenue = price_unit * units_sold) %>%
  select(date, total_revenue)
head(dtts)
```

```{r}
# Monthly aggregate
library(zoo)
dtts_monthly <- dtts %>%
  mutate(month = as.yearmon(date)) %>%   
  group_by(month) %>%
  summarise(total_revenue = sum(total_revenue, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")
print(dtts_monthly)
```

## Visualisasi
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(dtts_monthly, aes(x = month, y = total_revenue)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  geom_point(color = "darkgrey") +
  labs(title = "Total Revenue per Month",
       x = "Time Period",
       y = "Total Revenue ($)") +
  theme_minimal()
```
